name: EDockStationType
comment:
@todo: Change this in favour for more flexible docking stations (for instance, boats) that can be done in mods
Different type of docks.

name: UFGDockableInterface
comment:
For blueprint support of the interface, we will never add anything to it, just use it to
have a UCLASS to be able to access

name: IFGDockableInterface
comment: @brief Interface for all dockable classes out there, i.e. trucks and trains.

methods.name: CanDock
methods.comment: Check if this thing can dock at the given type of docking station.

methods.name: GetDockInventory
methods.comment: Get the input/output inventory for this dockable thing.

methods.name: GetDockFuelInventory
methods.comment: Get the fuel inventory for this dockable thing.

methods.name: WasDocked
methods.comment: Called when it was docked to the station.

methods.name: WasUndocked
methods.comment: Called when it was undocked from the station.

methods.name: OnBeginLoadVehicle
methods.comment: Called when we start loading the vehicle

methods.name: OnBeginUnloadVehicle
methods.comment: Called when we start unloading the vehicle

methods.name: OnTransferComplete
methods.comment: Notify for when loading/unloading are completed
